definition: Han River
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
man
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
surname Jiang

sentences.english: Since it was from the Han River, it's something fish-like.
sentences.chinese: 這怪物來自漢江，所以有點像魚。

sentences.english: Large parts of the Han river that bisects the capital are frozen over.
sentences.chinese: 將首爾從中隔斷的漢江出現大面積結冰。

sentences.english: Government officials in the south are keenly aware of the changes coming to the Han.
sentences.chinese: 南方的政府官員非常明白漢江會面臨的變化。

sentences.english: Dad persuaded the captain of a pien-tzu to take them down the Han River to Hankow.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸說服一條“扁舟”的船老大帶他們順漢江去漢口。

sentences.english: One side diversion brings water from the Yangtze to the Han.
sentences.chinese: 一方面要把長江之水帶入漢江。

sentences.english: The running Hanjiang River water has cultivated the Xiantao people's unremitting self-improvement spirit.
sentences.chinese: 奔騰不息的漢江水，孕育了仙桃人自強不息的精神。

sentences.english: The Xikang railway, which will be completed in 2000 estimated, connect the ship way at Ankang.
sentences.chinese: 預計2000年建成的西康鐵路在安康與漢江連通。

sentences.english: A stretch of the Hanjiang River at Hanzhong City reached its highest point so far this year.
sentences.chinese: 在漢中市漢江水位，達到今年以來的最高水位點。

sentences.english: The bridge is firing 190 tons of water per minute using river water.
sentences.chinese: 大橋利用漢江可以每分鐘噴射190噸江水。

sentences.english: Why is an ambitious dream by Hanjiang River awakened in the lamps of seven stars?
sentences.chinese: 漢江邊的大夢，何以竟在七星燈中醒來。

definition: Wuhua county in Meizhou 梅州, Guangdong/Wuhua district of Kunming city 昆明市[Kun1 ming2 shi4], Yunnan
Guanyang county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi
carriage
army camp

continuous/unending
Qi county in Hebi 鶴壁|鹤壁[He4 bi4], Henan
Xiling Gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze, the lower of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
Qutang Gorge, 8 km long gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze in Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2 qing4], the upper of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
Guishan or Kueishan township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
mountain pass
Lantian county in Xi'an 西安[Xi1 an1], Shaanxi
variant of 宏圖|宏图[hong2 tu2]
appearance/view/abiding impression
nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
to run dry (of river)
